title: Internal compiler error encountered while using Nightly v1.51.0-nightly (04caa632d 2021-01-30)

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
While building Polkadot, I encountered this error at the module `Compiling libp2p-mdns v0.26.0` ### Code The code lives here: https://github.com/paritytech/polkadot ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.51.0-nightly (04caa632d 2021-01-30) binary: rustc commit-hash: 04caa632dd10c2bf64b69524c7f9c4c30a436877 commit-date: 2021-01-30 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.51.0-nightly LLVM version: 11.0.1 ``` ### Error output ``` Compiling libp2p-mdns v0.26.0 error: internal compiler error: failed to process buffered lint here --> /home/vagrant/.cargo/registry/src/github.com-1ecc6299db9ec823/libp2p-mdns-0.26.0/src/service.rs:293:37 | 293 | Err(err) => log::error!("if watch returned an error: {}", err), | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ | = note: delayed at /rustc/04caa632dd10c2bf64b69524c7f9c4c30a436877/compiler/rustc_lint/src/early.rs:384:18 = note: this error: internal compiler error originates in a macro (in Nightly builds, run with -Z macro-backtrace for more info) thread 'rustc' panicked at 'no errors encountered even though `delay_span_bug` issued', compiler/rustc_errors/src/lib.rs:974:13 note: run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=1` environment variable to display a backtrace error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug. note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/new?labels=C-bug%2C+I-ICE%2C+T-compiler&template=ice.md note: rustc 1.51.0-nightly (04caa632d 2021-01-30) running on x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu note: compiler flags: -C opt-level=3 -C embed-bitcode=no --crate-type lib note: some of the compiler flags provided by cargo are hidden query stack during panic: end of query stack error: could not compile `libp2p-mdns` To learn more, run the command again with --verbose. warning: build failed, waiting for other jobs to finish... error: failed to compile `polkadot v0.8.27 (https://github.com/paritytech/polkadot?tag=v0.8.27#2f845699)`, intermediate artifacts can be found at `/tmp/cargo-install30MKt1` Caused by: build failed ```
Backtrace

``` ```
